parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Set count of ammo in magazine on pylon (supports pylon name since Arma 3 v1.93.145594)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setAmmoOnPylon''' [pylon, ammocount]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [pylon, ammocount]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] or [[String]] - pylon index (index starts from 1) or pylon name (see [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] Example 4)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> ammocount: [[Number]] - ammo count
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setAmmoOnPylon]] [1, 12];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setAmmoOnPylon]] ["pylon1", 12];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[animatePylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]],[[setMagazineTurretAmmo]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 18, 2017 - 14:20 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The pylon indices start at 1 and not at 0.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
